job.title: Animate Anyone Research Developer
job.description:
A new AI software called "Animate Anyone" has come out with a limited release.  The information we have about it is very limited.  After reading online chat conversations, apparently there is a release that has been written in Chinese.  We need a developer who can research the release and give us this software in useable English form.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8PCn5hLKNu4

See this chat thread which mentions a Chinese limited release:
https://github.com/HumanAIGC/AnimateAnyone/issues/57

https://www.augustman.com/in/gear/tech/animate-anyone-ai-tool-controversy-details/

https://decrypt.co/208614/chinese-tech-giant-alibaba-shows-off-ai-that-can-animate-anyone

https://indianexpress.com/article/technology/artificial-intelligence/animate-anyone-deepfake-9055259/

This is the GitHub page for Animate Anyone:
https://github.com/HumanAIGC/AnimateAnyone

We think this is someone's attempt at using it:
https://github.com/guoqincode/Open-AnimateAnyone
https://github.com/MingtaoGuo/AnimateAnyone_unofficial

The developer should provide us with a finished usable application, with the same quality shown in the Animate Anyone videos.  Please include a time estimation for total costs, as well as an expected completion date in your Upwork bid.

Thank you.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled and experienced Animate Anyone Research Developer to join our team for a short-term project, lasting less than one month. As an ideal candidate, you should have strong proficiency in JavaScript and AI development, with a solid background in code review and ASP.NET.

Your main responsibility will be to conduct research and develop solutions to animate characters and objects based on user input. You will be expected to work closely with our development team to ensure smooth integration of the animation features into our existing platform.

To be considered for this role, please submit a detailed proposal outlining how you can contribute to the project. Additionally, we would appreciate if you could provide relevant links to past completed projects that demonstrate your expertise in the field.

We are excited to collaborate with a talented Animate Anyone Research Developer who can bring innovative ideas to life through animations.

After reading online chat conversations, apparently there is a release that has been written in Chinese.  We need a developer who can research the release and give us this software in useable form.

demonstrating its usage.
